languages.text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Тем более... мне известно, каким силам ты служишь, {name}. Если ты считаешь, что я останусь подле тебя, когда пелена окончательно пожрет тебя... нет. Нет, этого не будет. Но, признаться, риск лишь сильнее бередит нервы — и потому я пока еще рядом. На грани лезвия".

{n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Тем более... мне известно, каким силам ты служишь, {name}. Если ты считаешь, что я останусь подле тебя, когда пелена окончательно пожрет тебя... нет. Нет, этого не будет. Но, признаться, риск лишь сильнее бередит нервы — и потому я пока еще рядом. На грани лезвия".

On the edge of the blade."

No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的眼睛眯成了两条缝。{/n}“如果说，还有别的什么理由的话……我知道你渴望侍奉的什么样的力量，{name}。如果你以为，当那种欲望最终吞噬你时，我还会站在你身边……那就大错特错了。不，这种事情想都别想。但我得承认，这种危险时刻悬在我的心头，这也正是我依然留在这里的原因——在刀尖上起舞。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的眼睛眯成了两条缝。{/n}“如果说，还有别的什么理由的话……我知道你渴望侍奉的什么样的力量，{name}。如果你以为，当那种欲望最终吞噬你时，我还会站在你身边……那就大错特错了。不，这种事情想都别想。但我得承认，这种危险时刻悬在我的心头，这也正是我依然留在这里的原因——在刀尖上起舞。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los párpados hasta dejar solo una rendija entre ellos.{/n} «Razón de más... Conozco bien los poderes a los que sirves, {name}. Si crees que voy a permanecer a tu lado cuando el velo te devore finalmente... no. No, eso no ocurrirá. Aunque he de admitir que el riesgo me solivianta... y por eso sigo aquí. Al filo del peligro».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los párpados hasta dejar solo una rendija entre ellos.{/n} «Razón de más... Conozco bien los poderes a los que sirves, {name}. Si crees que voy a permanecer a tu lado cuando el velo te devore finalmente... no. No, eso no ocurrirá. Aunque he de admitir que el riesgo me solivianta... y por eso sigo aquí. Al filo del peligro».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « De plus... je sais quelles puissances vous avez choisies de servir, {name}. Si vous pensez que je resterai à vos côtés quand le voile s'emparera de vous... vous faites erreur. Toutefois, je dois avouer que cette éventualité m'agace au plus haut point. Et c'est pour cela que je suis encore là. Toujours sur le fil du rasoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « De plus... je sais quelles puissances vous avez choisies de servir, {name}. Si vous pensez que je resterai à vos côtés quand le voile s'emparera de vous... vous faites erreur. Toutefois, je dois avouer que cette éventualité m'agace au plus haut point. Et c'est pour cela que je suis encore là. Toujours sur le fil du rasoir. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai presst seine Augen zu Schlitzen zusammen.{/n} "Umso mehr Grund ... Ich weiß, welchen Mächten Ihr dient, {name}. Wenn Ihr glaubt, ich würde an Eurer Seite bleiben, wenn der Schleier Euch irgendwann verschlingt ... nein. Nein, das wird nicht passieren. Aber ich muss zugeben, das Risiko zehrt an meinen Nerven – und deswegen bin ich noch hier. Am Rand der Klinge."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai presst seine Augen zu Schlitzen zusammen.{/n} "Umso mehr Grund ... Ich weiß, welchen Mächten Ihr dient, {name}. Wenn Ihr glaubt, ich würde an Eurer Seite bleiben, wenn der Schleier Euch irgendwann verschlingt ... nein. Nein, das wird nicht passieren. Aber ich muss zugeben, das Risiko zehrt an meinen Nerven – und deswegen bin ich noch hier. Am Rand der Klinge."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが目を細める。{/n}「だからこそだ…お前がどんな力に仕えているのか、俺様は知っているんだ、{name}。ヴェールがお前を喰らい尽くす時に、俺が側にいると思っているのなら…ありえん話だ。そんなことは起こり得ない。だが、そのリスクが俺の心を掻き立てるのも確かだ。だからこそ、俺はまだここにいる。この刃の上にな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, . If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılarak çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Hem böylesi daha iyi... Hangi güçlere hizmet ettiğini biliyorum {name}. Örtü seni en nihayetinde yiyip bitirdiğinde yanında kalacağımı sanıyorsan hayır... Öyle bir şey olmayacak. Ancak itiraf etmem gerekirse bu tehlike, sinirime dokunduğuyla kalıyor. Bu yüzden hâlâ buradayım. Tehlikenin eşiğinde yaşıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "All the more reason... I know what powers you serve, {name}. If you think I will stay by your side when the veil finally devours you... no. No, that will not happen. But, admittedly, the risk only grates on my nerves — and that is why I am still here. On the edge of the blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılarak çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Hem böylesi daha iyi... Hangi güçlere hizmet ettiğini biliyorum {name}. Örtü seni en nihayetinde yiyip bitirdiğinde yanında kalacağımı sanıyorsan hayır... Öyle bir şey olmayacak. Ancak itiraf etmem gerekirse bu tehlike, sinirime dokunduğuyla kalıyor. Bu yüzden hâlâ buradayım. Tehlikenin eşiğinde yaşıyorum."
